channel.title: Misc on mtn
channel.description: Recent content in Misc on mtn

item.title: Hello world
item.description: I set up the infrastructure for this site over a year ago but never got around to actually using it. There are a few reasons why I'm starting now: I want to engage more deeply with my projects and experiments It's good writing practice Occasionally I think of interesting things and want to share more of them These reasons could have worked just as well a year ago, but oh well!
